channel.title: error on ThingsDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in error on ThingsDB documentation

item.title: code
item.description: Returns the error code of an error type. This function does not generate a change. Function error.code() Arguments None Return value Returns error code of an error. Example This code uses code() to return the error code for an error: type_err("incorrect type").code(); Return value in JSON format -61

item.title: msg
item.description: Returns the error message of an error type. This function does not generate a change. Function error.msg() Arguments None Return value Returns error message of an error. Example This code uses code() to return the error code for an error: type_err("incorrect type").msg(); Return value in JSON format "incorrect type"
